text: Ānāpānassati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā
edit: Ānāpānassati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā

translations.transtext: Monks, the mindfulness of breathing, [when] having been cultivated and practiced frequently, is rich in result, rich in benefit.
